pr_title: [CDAP-16712] Separate out preview manager and preview runners so that they can be run independently in their own containers.

timeline.bodyText: What is the PreviewRunnerSystemTerminator supposed to do? Is it the component running in the preview manger for deleting the StatefulSet?
timeline.author: chtyim

replies.bodyText: Removed this interface for now as it was being used to do System.exit(0) in distributed only. Will do that change on 6.1 branch
replies.author: sagarkapare

timeline.bodyText: Is this the API for the queue polling? If it is, the path is better be /previews/requests/pull.
timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.bodyText: You can just do a byte[] pollerInfo = Bytes.toBytes(request.content().nioBuffer());
timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.bodyText: It is better to return 200 with an empty body if there is no pending request in the queue, since that is expected. Not found is used for unexpected case (e.g. the endpoint does not exist).
timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.bodyText: What is this for?? Since this class is a Service, if the caller is interested in the completion of this Service, it should just add a Service Listener to this instance.
timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.bodyText: Is this copy from TMSLogAppender? What are the differences? If the only different is in the guice injector annotation, there is way to work around it by making the TMSLogAppender non-final and have this as a sub-class with a different constructor.
timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.message: Fixed the abstraction leaking by removing the dependency of DefaultPreviewRunnerManager on the PreviewRequestFetchers.

timeline.bodyText: Is PreviewRunner a singleton? If it is, you can just get it from normal injection without the use of factory. In the PreviewRunnerManager, you can inject a Provider<PreviewRunnerService> for creating multiple instances.
timeline.author: chtyim

replies.bodyText: As discussed offline keeping the current changes. Filed https://issues.cask.co/browse/CDAP-17163 fore refactoring.
replies.author: sagarkapare

timeline.bodyText: Should call stop() instead of shutDown(), otherwise the service state won't be correct
timeline.author: chtyim

timeline.bodyText: Be consistent with naming. Since the type is PreviewRunnerService, you should have the field as previewRunnerServices
timeline.author: chtyim
